ingredients: 1  mango - peeled, seeded, and diced, 1 cup frozen strawberries, 1 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt, 6 ounces pineapple juice,   +   1/2 cup frozen blueberries
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Cholesterol 6mg 2%, Sodium 87mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 5g 18%, Total Sugars 46g, Protein 7g, Vitamin C 78mg 388%, Calcium 250mg 19%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 692mg 15%
